mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, content, link, extra_data, read_flag, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_notification ( id, user_id, title, content, link, extra_data, read_flag, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{link}, #{extraData}, IFNULL(#{readFlag}, 0), IFNULL(#{createdAt}, NOW()), IFNULL(#{updatedAt}, NOW()) )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
